name: Supernet2-BackpacksReloaded
title: Supernet2s Backpacks Reloaded
author: Supernet2
description: Supernet2 Has modified this to support factorio 1.x versions, original text here --> 'This is a quick and dirty 0.17 port, I take no credit for the mod.   Store your items in backpacks to carry more junk. Lets be real, if you can carry a train in your pocket, you can carry 20 backpacks.'
